comment.author: Jamie
comment.text: Get your facts straight Trump Trolls. No re-opened email investigation. No need to get your knickers in a twist. The emails being looked at aren't even from Hillary's server. http://www.dailykos.com/story/2016/10/28/1587987/-No-re-opened-email-investigation-the-emails-looked-at-aren-t-even-from-Hillary-s-personal-server?detail=facebook
